name: Asymmetry (EndgameZero)
description:
Asymmetry is a tile-based puzzle game where you use the same set of arrow keys to control multiple boxes at once. They don't all react to the controls in the same way though; some of them move as you'd expect, but others swap their movements on one or both axes, meaning their movements are mirrored or rotated compared with each other.

Eventually, I plan to add more levels and more types of puzzle elements.
